item.title: MVN: An R Package for Assessing Multivariate Normality
item.description: Full Citation: Korkmaz, S., Goksuluk, D., Zararsiz, G. (2014). MVN: an R package for assessing multivariate normality. The R Journal, 6(2), 151-162.
